#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    long long int t,i,a,b,c,k;
    float ans;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++){
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld",&a,&b,&c,&k);
        if(c>=k)
          printf("0\n");
        else {
            c=c-k;
            ans=ceil((-b+sqrt((b*b)-(4*a*c)))/(2*a));
            printf("%.0f\n",ans);
        }  
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
